textClass.keywords: Compton anisotropies from magnesium oxyde crystal

div.head: Report:
div.p: The mesurements were carried out using 3 crystals (from the same rod) oriented in the 3 orthogonal directions ([loo] The ultimate goal is here to retrieve informations mostly concerning the ionicity of MgO by the method used for LiH by Gillet and Becker (Gillet, Becker & Loupias, "The refinement of anisotropic Compton profiles and of momentum densities", Acta tryst. A5 1,405-413, 1995). In that respect, we plan to reconstruct of the momentum density in the crystal, and thus, to refine a wave function model with a minimum of relevant chemical parameters.
